verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w earthen|strong="H2789"\w* bottle, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w take|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ennom, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earthen \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* thou shalt \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* affliction \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w tingle|strong="H6750"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* forsaken \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* profaned \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* sacrificed therein \w to|strong="H0430"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* innocents.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Baalim, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* holocaust \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Baalim: \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* once \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Topheth|strong="H8612"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ennom, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w defeat|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2719"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w carcasses|strong="H5038"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* meat \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* air, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* astonishent, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*: \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, shall \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* shall \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* thereof.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w siege|strong="H4692"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w distress|strong="H4689"\w* wherewith \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* straiten \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* thou shalt \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* bottle \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w even|strong="H5750"\w* \w so|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* whole \w again|strong="H5750"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w Topheth|strong="H8612"\w*, \w because|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w Topheth|strong="H8612"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Topheth|strong="H8612"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* roots \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sacrificed \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* drink offerings \w to|strong="H1961"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* Jeremias \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Topheth|strong="H8612"\w*, whither \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* prophecy, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evils \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w necks|strong="H6203"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.
